name: Productivity and Technology Data
objective: To provide, analyze, and publish data on productivity trends in the U.S. economy, as well as in major sectors, individual industries and states, and examine the factors underlying productivity change.

results.description: Each year, BLS publishes over 2 million series, indexes, and other data products across its programs, including Productivity and Technology Data.
